cardList.name: Ventriloquist
cardList.description: Send voice to target area within 50 ft

cardList.name: Bird's Eye
cardList.description: View a target area from the sky, Lasts for 1 minute

cardList.name: Fairy Light
cardList.description:
Gain a floating orb that follow the character and illuminates a 50 ft radius
Lasts for 1 hour

cardList.name: Heal Self
cardList.description: Heal for `(lv/5)d4`

cardList.name: Fool's Cackle
cardList.description: A target is surrounded by violent laughter that causes them to have disadvantage on `(lv/10)d4` saving throw(s)

cardList.name: Shout of the Bodyguard
cardList.description: Taunt a target, they must make a `DC10+lv` wisdom save or be forced to attack you.

cardList.name: Guess Who?
cardList.description: Cause target to feel as though someone is tapping on their shoulder

cardList.name: Smoke Puppet
cardList.description:
Create a copy of a target
 The copy can not interact with physical objects and has 1 hp

cardList.name: Fleet Foot
cardList.description: Disengage and move 2x normal movement

cardList.name: Coin Pact
cardList.description:
Spend 1gp
 Bond with a simple familiar that will follow commands until death

cardList.name: Healing Melody
cardList.description: Heal target within 30 ft `(lv/5)d6+CHA`

cardList.name: North Wind
cardList.description:
Summon a strong gust that pushes a target back 3d10 ft
 If the target makes contact with any solid surface, they take `(lv/5)d6` bludgeoning damage

cardList.name: Babel's Tongue
cardList.description: Gain the ability to speak any 1 language for 10 min

cardList.name: Flare
cardList.description:
Burn a target
 Deal `(lv/5)d6+INT` fire damage

cardList.name: Apprentice's Die
cardList.description: Cast a random simple card

cardList.name: Shard
cardList.description:
Cast a ice shard at a target
 Deal `(lv/5)d6+INT` ice damage

cardList.name: Curse
cardList.description:
Strike a target with dark energy
 Deal `(lv/5)d6+(lv/4)d4+INT` necrotic damage at the start of the next turn

cardList.name: Shock
cardList.description:
Shock a target with a small jolt of electricity causing target's movement to be halved next turn
 Deal `(lv/5)d4+INT` electric damage

cardList.name: Fog of War
cardList.description:
Fill surroundings with fog
 All characters, except the caster, have disadvantage on sight based rolls
 Lasts `(lv/4)d4` min

cardList.name: Hover
cardList.description: Target now levitates 1 ft above the ground for 1 hr

cardList.name: Wizard's Armor
cardList.description: Target gains +`(lv/5)` AC for 10 min

cardList.name: Phase Shift
cardList.description: Swap places with a visible target within a 50ft range

cardList.name: Ether Bolt
cardList.description:
Cast a magic bolt at a target
Deal `(lv/5)d6+INT` damage

cardList.name: Monk's Prayer
cardList.description: At the start of your next turn heal `(lv/5)d8+CHA`

cardList.name: Shadow Strike
cardList.description:
Teleport behind a target within 50ft
Take a normal attack turn as a bonus action

cardList.name: Alchemist's Cask
cardList.description:
Throw an alchemist's brew at a target
Deal `(lv/5)d6+WIS` poison damage and `(lv/5)d4` to any targets within 5ft

cardList.name: Soft Aura
cardList.description: Heal all allies within 30ft `(lv/5)d4+CHA`

cardList.name: Ether Coating
cardList.description: Give a weapon +`(lv/3)` damage for 3 turns

cardList.name: Siphon
cardList.description: Drain `(lv/6)d4+WIS`

cardList.name: Razor's Edge
cardList.description:
Take a normal weapon attack turn
Target takes extra `50%` of damage inflicted on your next turn

cardList.name: Counter
cardList.description:
Cast at anytime to block an enemies normal attack or simple card
Pass next turn

cardList.name: Campfire
cardList.description: Create a campfire

cardList.name: Grappler
cardList.description: Pull yourself to and object or character within 50ft

cardList.name: Amnesia
cardList.description: Cause NPC character to forget the last 5 minutes

cardList.name: Four Leaf Clover
cardList.description: Gain +`(lv/6)` on all saving throws for 1 hour

cardList.name: Holy Light
cardList.description: Heal a target in a 30 ft range for `((lv/4)*2)d4+WIS`

cardList.name: Quicksand
cardList.description:
Create a pit of quicksand
 Targets caught remain rooted until a STR save of `10+(lv/2)`

cardList.name: Wizard's Barrier
cardList.description:
Create an invisible barrier that blocks ranged attacks
Breaks after taking `10+(lv*2)` damage

cardList.name: Shout of the Bulwark
cardList.description:
Taunt a target, they must make a `DC10+lv` wisdom save or be forced to attack you.
 Gain +`(lv/5)` AC for 1 min

cardList.name: Scouter's Eye
cardList.description: Gain detailed information on a targets stats

cardList.name: Berserker's Spirit
cardList.description: Gain +`(lv/4)*2` to your next attack roll if below `25%` health; take a normal attack turn as a bonus action

cardList.name: Spirit Lash
cardList.description:
Target gains +10ft range to melee attacks
 Lasts for `lv` min(s)

cardList.name: Transmute
cardList.description: Change one card into any card of at least one rarity tier lower

cardList.name: Spirit Sap
cardList.description:
Implant spirit seeds into a target
Drain `(lv/4)d4` health from target for 3 turns

cardList.name: Rain of Blades
cardList.description:
Rain down ethereal blades on a target
Deal `((lv/4)*3)d4` damage

cardList.name: Caster's Die
cardList.description: Cast a random special card

cardList.name: Fireball
cardList.description:
Cast a fireball at a target
 Deal `(lv/3)d6+INT` fire damage

cardList.name: Frost Blade
cardList.description:
Cast a frost blade that hits any targets in a `10x20`ft cone in front of you
 Deal `((lv/4)*2)d4+INT` ice damage

cardList.name: Spreading Lightning
cardList.description:
Cast a lightning bolt on a target, if another character is within 15 ft cast again on new target
Can not hit the a target twice
Deal `(lv/5)d8+INT` electric damage

cardList.name: Dark Pact
cardList.description:
Bond with a special familiar that will follow commands until death
Take `1d4` damage

cardList.name: Quiet Aura
cardList.description:
Targets within a 30ft range will not attack you unless attacked by you
Lasts for 10 min

cardList.name: Disguise
cardList.description:
Create a disguise of your choosing
Gain +`((lv/8)*2)` on CHA rolls related to your disguise

cardList.name: Berserker's Focus
cardList.description:
Choose a target: you may only attack them for 30sec, but you deal 2x damage during this period
Taunt all enemies within a 25ft radius to attack you

cardList.name: Monk's Chant
cardList.description: At the start of your next turn heal all allies in a 30 ft radius for `((lv/5)*2)d8+CHA`

cardList.name: Pure of Heart
cardList.description: Heal all characters in a 30ft radius `((lv/3)*3)d6`

cardList.name: Nothing Personal
cardList.description:
Teleport behind a target in 50 ft range
Deal weapon damage without having to make an attack roll

cardList.name: Ether Volley
cardList.description:
Cast 3 ether bolts, that can be directed a different targets
Each bolt deals `(lv / 5)d6+INT`

cardList.name: Sacrifical Spike
cardList.description: Take X damage, deal 2x damage taken to target

cardList.name: Warm Aura
cardList.description: Heal all allies within 30 ft `(lv/4)d6 & d4+CHA`

cardList.name: Elemental Rush
cardList.description:
Hit a target within 50 ft with a rush of elemental energy
Deal `(lv / 4)d6 & d4` damage

cardList.name: Drag
cardList.description: Pull a target or object up to `100kg` towards you

cardList.name: Mist Form
cardList.description:
You disappear into the Shrouded Plane
 Lasts up to 5x character movement

cardList.name: Skull Key
cardList.description: Open any locked door

cardList.name: Diviner's Sight
cardList.description:
Gain +`(lv/4)` to all saving throws for 24 hours
 Character has eye on their forehead for duration

cardList.name: Shout of the Guardian
cardList.description:
Taunt all targets in a 30ft range, they must make a `DC10+lv` wisdom save or be forced to attack you.
 Double your current health for 1 min

cardList.name: Executioner
cardList.description: Place a mark on target that kills them when their health drops below `20%`

cardList.name: Heaven's Kiss
cardList.description: Revive a dead target

cardList.name: Blood Pact
cardList.description:
Bond with a heroic spirit that will follow commands until death
Take `1d12` damage

cardList.name: Last Stand
cardList.description: If you are below `10%` health, heal `(lv/3)d12` and knock any enemies back 30ft

cardList.name: Duel Marble
cardList.description: Transport you and a target to a ethereal plane until one dies

cardList.name: Wizard's Die
cardList.description: Cast a random heroic card

cardList.name: Radiant Aura
cardList.description: Heal all allies in a 50ft radius `(lv/5)d8 & d6+CHA`

cardList.name: Angelic Tide
cardList.description: Heal `(lv/4)d8+CHA` to all allies in a 30ft radius at the end of your turn for 3 turns

cardList.name: Wildfire
cardList.description:
Cast a `10x20`ft cone of fire
Deals `(lv/3)d6` fire damage and burns targets `(lv/5)d4` for 3 turns

cardList.name: Plague
cardList.description:
Infect a target
Deal `(lv/4)d6+WIS` necrotic damage for 3 turns

cardList.name: Ether Explosion
cardList.description:
Cast ether bolts in a `10*(lv/6)`ft sphere around you
All enemies take `(lv/6)d6+INT` + the inverse of their distance from you damage

cardList.name: Elemental Torrent
cardList.description:
Rain elemental power on a target within 30ft
Deal `(lv/5)d4 & d6 & d8` damage

cardList.name: Brimstone
cardList.description: Turn 10ft radius to hot brimstone, any target in the area takes `(lv/4)d6` damage at the start of any turn when they are within the area

cardList.name: Desecrate
cardList.description:
Drain `(lv/3)d4` health from all targets in 10ft radius
50ft range

cardList.name: Ash
cardList.description:
Deal damage equal to 1/2 of targets current health
Target must be damaged

cardList.name: Banish
cardList.description: Send a target to the Ethereal Plane for `1d6` hours

cardList.name: Angel's Wings
cardList.description: Gain the ability to fly for 1 hour

cardList.name: Shout of the Colossus
cardList.description:
Taunt all enemies in a 50ft range, they must make a `DC10+lv` wisdom save or be forced to attack you.
Become immune for 1 min

cardList.name: Soul Pact
cardList.description:
Bond with a legendary familiar that will follow commands until death
Reduce your health by 1d10 until the familiar dies

cardList.name: Creator's Die
cardList.description: Cast a random legendary card

cardList.name: Forest of Blades
cardList.description:
Cast a `25x25`ft field of blades
Targets in the field take `((lv/5)*2)d8`+WIS slashing damage for every 5ft moved

cardList.name: Thunder Lord's Fury
cardList.description:
Strike every enemy in a 50ft radius with lightning, rooting all targets on next turn
Deal `((lv/5)*2)d6+INT` lightning damage to each target

cardList.name: Iron Maiden
cardList.description:
Lock target in a iron coffin
Target takes `((lv/3)*2)d8` damage each turn until make a STR `DC10+WIS` save

cardList.name: Elemental Blast
cardList.description:
Devestate an target within 50ft with elemental energy
Deal `(lv/5)d4 & d6 & d8 & d10` damage

cardList.name: Emperor's Fist
cardList.description:
Characterâ€™s fists become charged with celestial power
 Character can make 2 attacks that deal `(lv/4)d10+STR` on hit
 Lasts for 1 min

cardList.name: Dragon's Heart
cardList.description: Summon the spirit of one of the 6 celestial dragons

cardList.name: Chain Cast
cardList.description: Recast the last simple card you played

cardList.name: Explosive Cask
cardList.description:
Deal `((lv/5)*3)d4` to a target
Deal remaining damage on dice to self

cardList.name: Mark of Death
cardList.description:
Curse your weapon. The next target you hit becomes marked.
After X turns you may trigger the mark dealing X times your max health to the target

cardList.name: Sun's Plane
cardList.description:
Create a sphere of intense heat.
 All targets wearing medium or greater armor must make a CON save of `(10+8*log(lv))` or gain one level of exhaustion

cardList.name: Moon's Plane
cardList.description:
Create a sphere of intense cold.
 All targets wearing light or less armor must make a CON save of `(10+8*log(lv))` or be frozen in place

cardList.name: Reflective Armor
cardList.description:
Deal `((lv/5)*5)%` of damage taken back at all enemies in a 5ft radius
Lasts until end of encounter or after taking up to `50%` of your max health

cardList.name: Living Shield
cardList.description:
Link with a target
 `25%` of damage dealt to that target is dealt to you instead

cardList.name: The Wall
cardList.description: For `(lv/5)` turns, attacks against allies within a 5ft radius of you must beat your AC instead

cardList.name: Mighty Shout
cardList.description: Target must make a `DC10+lv` CON save or be rendered prone

cardList.name: Ironclad
cardList.description:
Become resistant to non-magical physical attacks
Lasts until you have taken `((lv / 5)*5)%` of your max health

cardList.name: Towering Persona
cardList.description: Gain `(lv/5)` to all intimidation based rolls for 12 hours

cardList.name: Bloodletting
cardList.description:
Reduce max health by `10%` gain +1 in a stat of your choosing
Reverts after dropping to 0 health or 12 hours

familiars.description:
1 hp
 Can't attack, can interact with objects

familiars.name: Spirit Animal
familiars.description:
1hp
 Form animal of your choosing that can't attack

familiars.name: Shoulder Speaker
familiars.description:
1hp
 Summon an imp that is invisible to others, it can't attack but can answer yes/no questions

familiars.name: Hugger
familiars.description:
12hp, AC 11
Summon a void creature that can grapple targets until they make a STR save of 15+

familiars.name: Varactyl
familiars.description:
Large four legged lizard mount
60 ft movement

familiars.name: Mist Goblin
familiars.description:
18 hp, 13 AC
 Dagger: 1d4 + 5 multiattack
 Can cast Mist Form once every 1 min

familiars.name: Acultist
familiars.description:
36 hp, 13 AC
Heal target for 1d10 + 2 at the cost of 4 hp

familiars.name: Royal Procession
familiars.description:
Carriage mount that can hold up to 5 people
60 ft movement

familiars.name: Pegasus
familiars.description:
80 hp
 Has flight with movement speed of 100 ft

familiars.name: Chain Devil
familiars.description:
60 hp, 16 AC
 Chain: 2d6 + 4 slashing damage that grapples target dealing 1d6 + 4 damage until free

familiars.name: Angelic Watcher
familiars.description:
48 hp, 13 AC
 Divine Touch: Heal target to full health (10 min cooldown)
Holy Aura: Heal all allies within 50 ft 2d6 + 4
